title: Dadeville man arrested, charged with shooting son
content:
DADEVILLE, AL (WTVM) -
The Tallapoosa County Sheriff's Department is investigating a shooting incident involving a father and son that occurred on Booger Hollow Road in Dadeville, AL.
On Friday, Nov. 25 at approximately 11:30 p.m., the department received a report from Lake Martin Hospital that a juvenile had been brought into the Emergency Room with a gunshot wound.
The victim sustained serious injury and was transferred to UAB Hospital in Birmingham.
Investigation revealed that the shooting occurred at the victim’s residence.
The suspect in the shooting was identified as 44-year-old Dalfos Dale Collum located on Booger Hollow Road in Dadeville.
Collum was taken into custody and charged with attempted murder. He remains in the Tallapoosa County Jail on a $50,000 bond.
The investigation is ongoing.
